mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Poketmon (ko_name, jp_name, NUMBER) VALUES (#{ko_name}, #{jp_name}, #{number})
INSERT INTO Detail (NUMBER, TYPE, SORT, CHARACTER, H_CHARACTER, E_POINT) VALUES(#{number},#{type},#{sort},#{spec},#{hspec},#{exp})
INSERT INTO Basic_Info (NUMBER, HEIGHT, WEIGHT, C_RATE, G_RATE) VALUES(#{number},#{tall},#{weight},#{crate},#{grate})
